ygData.subject: POST TRANSLATION: Bard's 47th Level Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... of ... ==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 22nd Song ====The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song ======Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders ========Citizen of the
ygData.messageBody:
Here's the translation my sister sent back:

----- Original Message -----

> This is rough, and there was one I didn't know, but....I think the rest is
> close:
>
> Follow alterations/changes with the spells given in this Patch(?)
> They are already registered in the database, the class (?)
> list will become completed as soon as possible
> Please give to us, then, some feedback, whether you want to see this sort
of
> information here in the future.
>
> (He who does not like things spoiled, please don't read further!)
>
> Summon Corpse: NEW! Level 39 Necromancer Spell
> Niv's Melody of Preservation: NEW! Level 47 Bard Song
> Shield of Lava: the duration bonus(?) will become heard/yielded to
> Screaming Terror: Manna cost(?) reduced by 30, stopped now 5 seconds (1
> tick) shorter, effect Enthrall (??)
> Psalm of Mystic Shielding: here a more uncertain/indefinite effect will
> become added.
> Alenia's Disenchanting Melody: Bonus duration on 0 sedation(?)
>
>
> The last part about sedation I'm not sure about either...
>

------------END MESSAGE-------------

==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 22nd Song
====The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
======Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
========Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
=========Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
===========Server: The Rathe
===============================================
